alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Cook; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 30 at 4:24PM EST until December 30 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EST FOR COOK...NORTHWESTERN LOWNDES AND NORTH CENTRAL BROOKS COUNTIES... At 424 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Adel, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Adel, Hahira, Sparks, Cecil, Reed Bingham State Park, Cook Co A/P, Barney, I-75 At Exit 29, Massee, Greggs and Pine Valley. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
